home.title: Barkio: Dog Monitor for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows
home.description: Barkio turns your two devices into a single dog monitoring app. Watch live video of your dog, hear every bark, and interact remotely.
home.ogdescription: Barkio is a new generation of the dog monitoring app. Watch, hear, and communicate with your dog remotely. Try it for free on Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows.
home.ogtitle: Barkio is a new generation of the dog monitoring app. Watch, hear, and communicate with your dog remotely. Try it for free on Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows.

header.h1: Your dog will never feel lonely at home on its own
header.h2: Meet a new generation of pet monitoring apps for your dogs and puppies. Try it for free.

modalplatforms.txt: Open this website on a particular device to download the app on that platform.
modalplatforms.txtlg: Barkio is a available for many operation systems like Android, iOS, macOS, Windows and Linux. Choose yours and never lose contact with your dog.

reasons.h3: Find out why Barkio is the best dog and pet monitoring app.

separation.txt1: If your dog is barking, howling, or whining when it's home alone, it may indicate
separation.txta: signs of separation anxiety in dogs
separation.txt2: Barkio pet monitor lets you watch a video of your puppy in real-time and communicate remotely.

watch.txt: Check on your puppy with Barkio pet cam. Monitoring your pup gives you a peace of mind knowing your pet is okay. Barkio is also handy when helping your dog settle in a new home.

track.txt: Is your dog barking, howling, running around, or sleeping in its bed? Barkio gives you an overview of all activities, so you can better understand your dog's behavior.

nohw.txt: With Barkio app, you can turn your old phones, tablets, or laptops into a pet camera. No need for overpriced cameras, dog treat dispensers, or collars.

features.h3: Check your pet from anywhere and at any time.

hd.txt: Watch your pet remotely with live HD video. With a 2-way video option, you will see your dog, and your pet will see you as well.

talk.txt: Hear if your dog barks or whines, calm your pet remotely, and record your own dog commands (voice messages).

check.txt: Barkio gives you an overview of all activities your pup has been up to. Replay captured noises to find out if your dog is anxious or if everything's alright.

invite.txt: All pet parents in your family can join the monitoring and check on your dog or puppy.

reach.txt: With WiFi and cellular data, you can check on your dog or puppy from anywhere. The distance between you and your pet is unlimited.

choose.txt: Security and reliability are our highest priorities. The whole communication is encrypted by industry-standard SSL. We'll notify you about your dog when anything happens.

banner.txt: Staying in touch with your dog has never been easier.

newsletter.txt: Receive pet parent tips, special offers, and photos of cute puppies right into your inbox.
newsletter.success: Thanks! ❤️ Check your inbox and confirm your email address.

first.txt: “Love it! My partner and I connect to check on our puppy when we go out to see what she's up to. Works flawlessly, plus costs a fraction compared to dog cameras. Recommend!“

second.txt: “Barkio helped me with training my fostered dog to feel comfortable and calm when I leave for an hour or two and gives me peace of mind. Barkio is a must for any dog owner.“

third.txt: “My neighbor complained about my dog Trixie howling and barking whenever I left. Barkio helped me to watch video of Trixie when I'm not there. Turned out, she wasn't barking at all!“
